metadata.title: CVE-2021-46877 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: jackson-databind 2.10.x through 2.12.x before 2.12.6 and 2.13.x before2.13.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (2 GB transient heapusage per read) in uncommon situations involving JsonNode JDKserialization.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
